Description:
STYLISH TOWNHOUSE
Modern townhouse tucked securely in a gated community resort only 100m from the beautiful Cowes foreshore Beach.
The home has been beautifully designed with space for the entire family. The upper level features two bedrooms with inbuilt wardrobes, family bathroom, modern kitchen, stylish open plan dining and lounge area with large light filled windows and access to an upper level balcony. The lower level offers two bedrooms, family bathroom and European laundry. The home has an attached spacious double car garage with inbuilt secure cupboards. The rear courtyard offers a private retreat with space to relax in the sun with a coffee and good book.
Additional features include full security system and split system heating and cooling on both levels.
The home is located in a small secure community with dual gated access and resort style facilities including in-ground heated pool and community bbq and eating area, and is located a short stroll from the Cowes foreshore beach and yacht club.
Immaculately presented and ready to enjoy, secure this beautiful property in time for Summer. Arrange your private inspection today.
Insights: 8/7 Beach Street, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
When Position Is Priority!
This is a great opportunity to secure this centrally located and private single level hardiplank residence perfect for permanent or holiday living and only a short flat stroll to local doctors, primary school and the shopping precinct of Cowes.
The neat and tidy home comprises three living areas, three robed bedrooms and two bathrooms; the master is complete with walk in robe, ensuite and polished timber floors. The open plan living kitchen and dining area features lovely raked ceilings with highlight windows allowing lots of natural light in and flows out onto the private undercover entertainment area.
Additional features include combustion heating, split system heating and cooling, polished timber floors, carpet and tiles throughout and single garage.
Set within a 694sqm approx fully fenced corner allotment and boasting lovely established surrounds, you will not need to look any further.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Location! Location! Location!
Enjoy an Island lifestyle from this perfectly positioned unit only 50 metres to the fabulous family friendly north facing bay beach and a leisurely 15 minute stroll along the beach to the shops, cafes & restaurants of Cowes.
Situated in a complex of only four, this beautifully presented double brick, single level home is ready for you to move in and enjoy!
Comprising a light filled open plan living, dining space including a functional kitchen, a combined laundry/bathroom, a second living area which can also be utilised as a fourth bedroom, stylish family bathroom and three good size bedrooms all with built in robes.
Leading out from the main living area is a lovely north facing private paved outdoor area perfect for relaxing and enjoying the company of family and friends.
Additional features include : Access behind a roller door to additional storage, split system heating/cooling, ceiling fans
With low maintenance surrounds combined with two car space parking, this property presents great value for permanent/holiday living or investment purposes. Properties in this brilliant location are a rare find!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
" COTTAGES FOR TWO " DOUBLE SPA COTTAGES
Here is a fantastic opportunity for the astute investor or business person to secure a very lucrative freehold walk-in walk-out accommodation business. Take advantage of the ever growing tourist numbers to Phillip Island.
‘Cottages for Two’, specialises in accommodation for couples to enjoy a romantic, private break away, plus visitors to the world renowned Penguin Parade and the many track events at the Phillip Island Grand Prix Circuit.
‘Cottages for Two’ is located in a high exposure position in the heart of Cowes, close to supermarket complexes, restaurants and shops. Situated on a 1475 square metre allotment (approx.), each private cottage is surrounded by a stunning cottage garden.
Comprising of six very spacious, self-contained and separate units (all near identical décor and layout), featuring one bedroom with queen sized bed, two BIR’s and ceiling fan, RV
air-conditioning, separate living area with two double sofas and flat screen TV. Couples kitchen including stove, bench plates, dishwasher, fridge/ freezer and microwave, dining nook, bathroom with double vanities, granite benchtops, heated towel rails, heat lamps and ‘out of sight’ laundry with washing machine and dryer. Each unit also features an outdoor patio with BBQ facilities.
ALL SIX COTTAGES include a double spa and an Ultimate Kent gas log fire plus a split system air conditioner for both heating and cooling.
A parking position is provided off street and under cover for each cottage.
Currently operating and achieving very attractive returns, with technology as it is today ‘Cottages for Two’ is ideally suited to be managed off site. Inspection strictly by appointment only.
Insights: 226-228 Settlement Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
STYLISH APARTMENT WITH STUNNING BAY VIEWS
This stylish 3 bedroom apartment has undoubtedly one of the best North facing positions on the Cowes foreshore. With stunning views overlooking Cowes jetty and French island beyond, it is centrally located amongst Cowes Cafes, restaurants and shopping precinct with a lovely bay beach directly in front. The apartment features an open plan living/dining and kitchen area, with modern, floating timber floors and opens onto a large North facing, sunny deck. The master bedroom has its own private deck and features an ensuite with spa bath and WIR. It also features a further two bedrooms with BIRs, a second bathroom with shower and bath, separate laundry and a powder room.The apartment complex also boasts an indoor heated pool and spa, a secure undercover car park (others available for sale), secure entry and elevator access to the apartments front door. If it is a luxury, low maintenance holiday apartment with magnificent views that you are looking for, then look no further.
Insights: 13/15-16 The Esplanade, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018 and 12 other 3 bedroom unit in Cowes have recently been sold.

Ready, Set, Build!
Ideally situated in Central Cowes is this parcel of land waiting to be built on! Set within a 400 sqm approx allotment and offering a large 6x8m garage- ideal for storing the boat/caravan. There is also a three bedroom dwelling adjacent for sale, so buy one or buy both.
The property is within easy walking distance to the Cowes shopping precinct and beautiful North facing Cowes beach. Vacant land in central Cowes is becoming a rare commodity.

YOU'LL LOVE THIS!

This apartment is perfect for entertaining family and friends whilst taking in the water vies and would be ideal for permanent or holiday living.

NEAT AS A PIN

The house comprises of two bedrooms, one bathroom, lovely open plan living and dining area with veranda to enjoy the West facing sunsets.
Nestled amongst leafy surrounds and within walking distance to the popular Red Rocks beach and Aussie Ranch golf course and close to the Cowes shopping precinct, this neat home would make the ideal holiday beach house or permanent home to make your own.

Description:
A HIDDEN TREASURE
Here is a real find in a quiet area of west Cowes, only minutes to beautiful Red Rocks Beach.
This delightful three bedroom home has been lovingly renovated to retain its retro features, with polished timber floors throughout. The kitchen has been completely renovated and features a retro double oven with rangehood, dishwasher and scullery/ laundry. The home also includes two main bedrooms (one with built in robes), a third bedroom/study with timber sliding door access onto a rear deck, bathroom with shower, an open plan living/dining area with wood heater and ceiling fans and an undercover veranda at the entrance of the home.
The fully fenced backyard comes complete with an array of fruit trees, vegetable boxes, chicken run, established gardens and shedding. Call today to arrange your inspection.

Description:
SPACIOUS FAMILY HOME
This beautiful home is located in Central Cowes, ideally spread over a spacious single level and is full of surprises.
Easy living with two living areas and a study. The kitchen is equipped with band new appliances and an ceramic cooktop. The dining area opens onto a beautiful outdoor area which is perfect for entertaining or just relaxing with the family. The home features 4 bedrooms, all with robes and the Master with an ensuite, and walk in robe.
The large double garage is fitted with a wood fire, making this the perfect extra retreat or man cave. Raised vegie patches feature in the back yard making it easy to plant up the summer vegies and the solar panels makes this home very energy efficient.
Located just around the corner there's a beautiful family friendly park, bike tracks and playground and on top of this you're only minutes from the Cowes Shopping precinct and beaches.
Fitted with the works, this home speaks for itself and is very low maintenance.
Inspection a must!

Description:
MUST SEA, MUST SELL!
This spacious north facing 4 bedroom home is an absolute gem and only footsteps from the Cowes foreshore beach, it doesn’t get much better than this!
Situated on a picturesque 612sqm (approx.) this home has been specifically designed for low maintenance and easy access, being wheelchair friendly throughout. Outside features a charming, low maintenance garden at the front and rear of the property with plenty of parking space, including a single garage, for the cars, caravan and of course the boat. There is a beautiful undercover entertaining area that opens out directly from the kitchen and dining area. With a spacious open plan living, dining and kitchen with beautiful ceilings and exposed beams throughout, this house offers warmth and comfort with the space and opportunity to put your own stamp on the property if you wanted to expand, or even go up a level and see some sparkling water views!
This property is positioned a short stroll to the Anderson Road boat ramp for easy access of all your ocean toys and while you’re at it you can enjoy a coffee and ice cream at the local Anderson Road Café. The property is also a short walk into the main township of Cowes where you can explore beach, Jetty, local restaurants & cafes, boutique shops and local primary schools.
This family home has been immaculately maintained and in this position - you can’t go wrong! Inspection is a must!
Insights: 11 McHaffie Drive, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
WALK TO RED ROCKS BEACH
Walk into this light filled open home, with high cathedral timber lined ceilings and be overwhelmed with the spacious generosity and warmth.
Surfboards on racks at the entrance leaves no doubt that the beach is close by and waiting for you to enjoy.
Beyond the bricked garden bed at the entrance lays an open plan living/dining and kitchen which flows out to a north facing under cover deck ready to entertain with friends and family.
A large open fire place raised on a brick hearth provides warmth in winter and evaporative cooling system keeps the temperature cooler for the warmer months with ceiling fans to aid circulation.
3 spacious bedrooms (all with BIR) and 2 bathrooms (ensuite with spa bath).
600m2 block of land - inquire about the vacant 600m2 block next door on the corner.
Request a private inspection.

Description:
Serenity in Central Cowes.
Outstanding opportunity on 2 titles - 1800 m2 (approx). Wander behind the picket fence and find yourself in an absolutely gorgeous garden oasis with a private and sunny deck for entertaining complete with spa and outdoor shower. This is beachside living and absolutely ideal as a holiday home or permanent home too! just a short stroll down the lane to the beach! Within a 5 minute stroll of the shops and cafes and the Cowes Yacht Club.
Enter into the open plan living space with large kitchen and dining, relax in the sunfilled spaces, filled with light from the large windows and doors opening to the deck. On this level there are three double bedrooms with built in robes, bathroom and laundry. Upstairs is a delightful loft style sittingroom with views to the garden and a spacious master bedroom with walk in robe and bathroom.
Huge rear north deck with spa.
Double garage and gate access for boats and caravans. Offering lane access and the opportunity to sell or develop the adjoining block - tennis court, pool, bungalow? Endless possibilities in this beautiful position. Redevelopment potential.
12 Vaughan - 980 m2 (approx)
14 Vaughan 846 m2 (approx)

Description:
Compact And Convenient!
Boasting a fantastic central location is this Single level brick veneer unit.
Comprising open plan living/ kitchen/ dining, two bedrooms, both with built in robes and one bathroom.
Other great features include split system heating/cooling, tiled floors throughout, undercover front verandah and a private undercover courtyard at the rear.
Situated only 200 metres from both Cowes Foreshore and Thompson Avenue, there is no need for the car, as you can walk to supermarkets, restaurants, shops, beach etc.

Description:
When Location Matters!
Perfectly positioned on a double block is this brick and hardiplank family beach house. Located just a short stroll from one of the Island's finest safe swimming beaches and boatramp this would make an ideal getaway or permanent home, comprising 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms over two levels.
Upstairs has open plan kitchen/living/dining with a sunny north-facing entertainer's deck flowing from the living area. The lower level has its own kitchen sink in the spacious living zone (currently utilised as fourth bedroom), huge third bedroom perfect for visiting family and friends.
Other great features include : Walk-in-pantry, split system heating/cooling, gas wood fire, polished floor boards, timber kitchen, external stairs fitted with seat elevator, ample storage, 2 water-tanks, shedding with concrete floor & power, double garage and an annex at the rear of the property which has the potential for further accommodation.
In need of a little TLC, this property is set within a lovely 1248m2 allotment that has subdivision potential STCA and beautiful established low maintenance surrounds.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
The Perfect Coastal Escape!
Situated in the highly sought after Red Rocks beach area is this contemporary double storey home; perfect for easy coastal escapes whilst just a very short walk to the renowned idyllic north facing beach. Upon entry to the home, the open floor plan boasts a warm and inviting layout comprising open plan kitchen including a 900mm wide stainless steel upright cooker, a comfortable living and dining area, family bathroom and spacious laundry as well as the main bedroom. Access through sliding doors from the living area open out to an expansive undercover entertaining space which could also be utilised for extra boat/caravan accommodation.
Timber stairs lead up to a lovely spacious light filled living area including a kitchenette and featuring timber floors and high ceilings. Sliding glass doors open to a huge private undercover balcony overlooking the delightful treed landscape; a perfect place to entertain. Also on this level are a further two good sized bedrooms both with built in robes and a family bathroom.
Additional features include : combustion heating to downstairs living, split system heating/cooling to upstairs living, ample storage, double carport, ceiling fans, fully fenced
All set on a large 705sqm approx landscaped allotment including a garden shed and lovely lawn area for children and pets to roam, this wonderful property is perfect for either permanent/holiday living or as an investment property.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
Brilliant Location Within 100 metres To The Beach!
Situated in a brilliant location within 100 metres to the fabulous north facing Cowes beach is this neat and tidy low maintenance single level home comprising plenty of accommodation including four bedrooms, bathroom and a spacious open plan kitchen, dining and living area complete with air conditioning and wood fire. The sunny rear yard is private with established trees and partially paved, perfect for outdoor entertaining whilst there is a smaller shaded deck at the front of the home with privacy from the street and a lovely peaceful outlook.
The home would make a wonderful holiday home in this highly sought after location or a permanent home and update at your leisure. Walk to everything from here!
Additional features include a garden shed for storage, long driveway with plenty of room for parking.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
Beautiful Family home
This newly updated home is located in the western part of Cowes, close to Red Rocks and Ventnor beaches. Featuring three good sized bedrooms, all with newly laid carpets. The open plan kitchen living area is complemented by a beautiful wood fire place. With plenty of cupboard space and room to move, this really is an entertainer's delight. The living and hallway flows seamlessly through the double sliding doors and out onto the entertaining deck. On an approximate land size of 627m2, the property also features a carport, is fully fenced and located in a quiet area perfect for you and the family or an ideal investment opportunity. This property is sure to impress!
